lst.name: sentence
lst.str: "Internationalisation of the yen through expansion of overseas portfolios in yen assets is the key to the success of global trading of yen bond futures," said Katsuyuki Okayasu, general manager of Yamaichi Securities Co Ltd's bond division.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: "Problems concerning cash bond delivery and clearing are major obstacles for an early launching at LIFFE," said Koki Chiyojima, deputy general manager of Nikko Securities Co Ltd's bond administration division.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Market participants here expect a clearing organisation to be set up by the time they have substantial deliverable cash issues, making overseas listings probable in the latter half of 1987.
